item.title: Les Parisiens
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: Stop Cribbing! It had been a year into our “settled” life in Bangalore. We had ended our travels in late 2019, and moved to Bangalore in the beginning of 2020 with the few material possession we still retained in our name. I spent weeks meeting folks from various startups and looking for a promising gig. Parul already had an offer within a week or so into her hunt. I eventually decided to join Google as impulsively as is wont of me.
